titleInfo.title: Letter from Richard Thomas Goodwin, Secretary and Translator in the Office of Country Correspondence, Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that an accompanying parcel (not present) contains a present, for the Governor of Kirman [KermƒÅn], of super fine cloth from the Governor of Bombay.
